body_html:
I download the inception-v3-2016-03-01.tar.gz and find the model file is 'model.ckpt-157585'.
However, the model file in inception-2015-12-05.tgz is a '.pb' file named as 'classify_image_graph_def.pb'.

Is the 'model.ckpt' model file created by slim while 'classify_image_graph_def.pb' not?
If so, i think it is convenient to update 'retrain.py' according to the new definition of inception-v3 to avoid confusion.

body:
I download the inception-v3-2016-03-01.tar.gz and find the model file is 'model.ckpt-157585'.
However, the model file in inception-2015-12-05.tgz is a '.pb' file named as 'classify_image_graph_def.pb'. 

Is the 'model.ckpt' model file created by slim while 'classify_image_graph_def.pb' not?
 If so, i think it is convenient to update 'retrain.py' according to the new definition of inception-v3 to avoid confusion.
